1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Message list.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message
6  ( module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Message,
7    abPara,
8
9    -- * Messages
10    -- ** Terms
11    checkTerm,
12    dupTerm,
13    reqNewTerm,
14    unevenTerms,
15    unmatchShare,
16
17    -- ** Require
18    reqBool,
19    reqRawText,
20    reqSingleEqual,
21    reqCollection,
22    reqInterp,
23    reqRel,
24    reqRelmap,
25    reqUnaryFn,
26
27    -- ** Dump
28    dumpCox,
29    dumpRel,
30    dumpTrees,
31
32    -- ** Others
33    noAttr,
34    notImpl,
35    diffHead,
36    notNestRel,
37  ) where
38
39import Koshucode.Baala.Core.Message
40import qualified Koshucode.Baala.DataPlus  as K
41import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core      as C
42
43
44-- | Abortable scope for relmap parameter.
45abPara :: (K.GetCodePos cp) => K.Abortable cp b
46abPara = K.abortable "parameter"
47
48
49-- ============================================  Messages
50
51-- ---------------------------------  Terms
52
53-- | [check-term failed]
54checkTerm :: String -> [K.TermName] -> K.Head -> K.Ab a
55checkTerm label ns he =
56    K.leftLines "check-term failed"
57         $ detailTermRel label ns he
58
59-- | [Duplicate term names] Duplicate ... in the terms ...
60dupTerm :: (K.GetTermNames t) => t -> K.Ab a
61dupTerm t =
62    K.leftLines "Duplicate term names"
63         $ msgTerms2 "Duplicate" t' "in the terms" t
64        where t' = K.duplicates $ K.getTermNames t
65
66-- | [Require new term names] Present ... in the terms ...
67reqNewTerm :: (K.GetTermNames t) => K.TermPicker c -> t -> K.Ab a
68reqNewTerm pk input =
69    K.leftLines "Require new term names"
70         $ msgTerms2 "Present" (K.preTerms pk) "in the terms" input
71
72-- | [Uneven terms] /N/ and /N/ terms
73unevenTerms :: (K.GetTermNames t1, K.GetTermNames t2) => t1 -> t2 -> K.Ab a
74unevenTerms t1 t2 = K.leftLine "Uneven terms" detail where
75    detail = n1 ++ " and " ++ n2 ++ " terms"
76    n1 = show . length $ K.getTermNames t1
77    n2 = show . length $ K.getTermNames t2
78
79-- | [Unmatch shared terms]
80unmatchShare :: [K.TermName] -> [K.TermName] -> K.Ab a
81unmatchShare e a =
82    K.leftLines "Unmatch shared terms"
83         $ expectActual (ts e) (ts a)
84    where ts xs = unwords $ K.termNameString <$> xs
85
86-- ---------------------------------  Require
87
88-- | [Require Boolean]
89reqBool :: K.Ab a
90reqBool = K.leftBecause "Require Boolean"
91
92-- | [Require unquoted text]
93reqRawText :: K.Ab a
94reqRawText = K.leftBecause "Require unquoted text"
95
96-- | [Require single equal sign]
97reqSingleEqual :: K.Ab a
98reqSingleEqual = K.leftBecause "Require single equal sign"
99
100-- | [Require collection]
101reqCollection :: K.Ab a
102reqCollection = K.leftBecause "Require collection"
103
104-- | [Require data interpretation]
105reqInterp :: K.Ab a
106reqInterp = K.leftBecause "Require data interpretation"
107
108-- | [Require relation]
109reqRel :: K.Ab a
110reqRel = K.leftBecause "Require relation"
111
112-- | [Require no relmaps]
113--   [Require one relmap]
114--   [Require /N/ relmaps]
115reqRelmap :: Int -> K.Ab a
116reqRelmap 0 = K.leftBecause "Require no relmaps"
117reqRelmap 1 = K.leftBecause "Require one relmap"
118reqRelmap n = K.leftBecause $ "Require " ++ show n ++ " relmaps"
119
120-- | [Require unary function]
121reqUnaryFn :: K.Ab a
122reqUnaryFn = K.leftBecause "Require unary function"
123
124-- ---------------------------------  Dump
125
126-- | [Dump content expression]
127dumpCox :: (Show c) => c -> K.Ab a
128dumpCox cox = K.leftLines "Dump content expression"
129                   $ lines $ show cox
130
131-- | [Dump relation]
132dumpRel :: (K.CRel c, K.MixEncode c) => K.Rel c -> K.Ab a
133dumpRel r = K.leftPage "Dump relation" $ C.relTableLines [] r
134
135-- | [Dump token trees]
136dumpTrees :: [K.Tree] -> K.Ab a
137dumpTrees trees = K.leftLines "Dump token trees"
138                   $ lines $ show $ K.treesDoc trees
139
140-- ---------------------------------  Others
141
142-- | [Attribute not found]
143noAttr :: String -> K.Ab a
144noAttr n = K.leftLine "Attribute not found" n
145
146-- | [Not implemented]
147notImpl :: K.Ab a
148notImpl = K.leftBecause "Not implemented"
149
150-- | [Different headings] \/T ..., \/T ...
151diffHead :: [K.Head] -> K.Ab a
152diffHead = K.leftLines "Different headings" . map showHead
153
154showHead :: K.Head -> String
155showHead = unwords . map K.termNameString . K.getTermNames
156
157-- | [Not a nested relation]
158notNestRel :: (K.GetTermNames t) => t -> K.Head -> K.Ab a
159notNestRel t he =
160    K.leftLines "Not a nested relation"
161         $ detailTermRel "Given" (K.getTermNames t) he
162
